description.value: Character can link to a vehicle via their Mind Impulse Unit, and in so doing be able to use their Intelligence Characteristic in place of Agility for Operate(Surface, Aeronautica, and Voidship) Tests. Whenever a vehicle suffers Critical damage whilst the character is linked in this way, they gain 1 Fatigue from the associated mental strain.
